languages.text: The character's STR and TGH are increased in the next combat. This is a one-time bonus that disappears after the combat ends.

languages.text: Increases the character's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} in the next combat. This is a one-time bonus that disappears after the combat ends.

languages.text: Bir sonraki çatışmada karakterin {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Kuvvet{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} niteliklerini artırır. Bu bonus tek seferliktir ve çatışma sona erdiğinde ortadan kalkar.

languages.text: Aumenta la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g} y la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} del personaje en el siguiente combate. Esta es una bonificación única que desaparece al terminar el combate.

languages.text: 在下一场战斗中，此角色的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}提高。此加成效果为一次性效果，会在战斗结束之后消失。

traits.locale_text: 在下一场战斗中，此角色的力量与坚韧提高。此加成效果为一次性效果，会在战斗结束之后消失。
